thread.title: Youtuber Creates Amazing NBA 2K17 MyPlayer Of Barack Obama
thread.title_full: Youtuber Creates Amazing NBA 2K17 MyPlayer Of Barack Obama

author: Kyle Rooney
title: Youtuber Creates Amazing NBA 2K17 MyPlayer Of Barack Obama
text:
Home > Entertainment > Youtuber Creates Amazing NBA 2K17 MyPlayer Of Barack Obama Youtuber Creates Amazing NBA 2K17 MyPlayer Of Barack Obama 3 0 Posted by Kyle Rooney , Feb 10, 2017 at 10:27am "Hello, fellow ballers!" 
Youtube personality NykeFaller created an incredible NBA 2K17 "MyPlayer" version of Barack Obama which takes us from his journey as 44th President of the United States to #44 on the Charlotte Hornets. 
We all knew Barack had some game on the basketball court but this MyPlayer character has turned the sliders all the way up, enabling the former POTUS to throw down 360 dunks while wearing custom Air Jordans and dabbing opponents to death. 
His voice towards the end could definitely use a little work, but the highlight of him posterizing Carmelo and then celebrating over his lifeless body more than make up for it. 
Check it out.
